product_name: The North Face Cipher Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's Cipher jacket from The North Face does double duty by keeping wind out while remaining breathable so you stay comfortable even during high-energy outdoor activities. Gore(R) WindStopper(R) eliminates windchill while staying breathable so you stay dry and warm without overheating. A Durable Water Repellent finish sheds light moisture. Underarm and side panels are made from Apex Aerobic soft-shell fabric with 4-way stretch for increased mobility and breathability. Center front zipper has an internal windflap; brushed chin guard lining is soft next to skin. Angled zip pockets; adjustable drawcord hem; adjustable rip-and-stick tab cuffs. The North Face Cipher jacket features a close-fitting, athletic cut. Part of The North Face Summit Series(TM) the Cipher jacket is designed and tested for use in harsh environments. Closeout.
short_description: The men's Cipher jacket from The North Face does double duty by keeping wind out while remaining breathable so you stay comfortable even during high-energy outdoor activities.
